aka: I Remember You Leaving All the Time

cast.name: 迪米特里斯·坡里卡库斯 Dimitris Poulikakos

this_title: Μια ζωή σε θυμάμαι να φεύγεις
trans_title: I Remember You Leaving All the Time
introduction: A love story set in the crucial transitional political period of the 1970s Greece.In Athens, a radical female journalist and a former stage actor share their lives against the backdrop of the regime change, right after the fall of the military dictatorship and the first legislative elections in 1974. The film provides a portrait of a new generation of professional women who fought for changes both in politics and in their personal lives.
chinese_title: Μια ζωή σε θυμάμαι να φεύγεις
